questions: What is Canva?
Can you explain what Canva is?
What does Canva do?
What kind of tool is Canva?
answer: Canva is an online design tool that lets you create graphics and presentations. If you have a Canva account, you can use it directly inside the app through the Canva integration.

questions: What does the Canva integration allow me to do?
What features are available with the Canva integration?
What can I do in the app using Canva?
How does the Canva integration help me design content?
answer: The Canva integration lets you browse your Canva library and insert your designs directly into the app without leaving it. You can connect your account, select images or presentations, and reuse or overwrite designs with just a few clicks.

questions: How do I use the Canva integration in the app?
How can I design with Canva inside the app?
What are the steps to use Canva in this tool?
How do I access and use Canva from within the platform?
answer: To use Canva in the app, first connect your Canva account. You can do this from the checklist or by clicking the Canva button when adding an image. Once connected, you’ll be able to see and select designs from your Canva library. Click 'Save and Insert' to add a design to your project. If you update the design later in Canva, just repeat the same steps to overwrite the previous version.

questions: How do I connect my Canva account?
What’s the process to link my Canva account?
How can I authorize my Canva account in the app?
Where do I go to connect Canva?
answer: Click the Canva button when adding an image or use the checklist option to connect. You'll be prompted to authorize your Canva account. Once authorized, your Canva library will be available directly inside the app.

questions: How do I insert a Canva image into a content block?
How can I add a Canva design to my project?
Where do I click to insert a Canva image?
What’s the method for adding a Canva image to content?
answer: Click the Canva button in the content block. Choose your design from the Canva library, then click 'Save and Insert'. The image will be added directly to your project in a folder called 'Canva images'.

questions: Why don't my Canva updates appear right away?
Why is the Canva preview not updated immediately?
Why is the old Canva design still showing?
How long does it take for Canva updates to show up?
answer: Canva previews can take 10 to 15 minutes to refresh. If you've updated a design, the thumbnail might still look old, but the correct version will be inserted when you use 'Save and Insert' again.

questions: How do I update a Canva image I already used?
Can I replace an existing Canva image with a new version?
What’s the process for updating a Canva graphic?
How do I overwrite a Canva design that’s already in my project?
answer: Edit the design in Canva, then return to the app and click the Canva button again. Select the same design and choose 'Save and Insert'. The app will prompt you to overwrite the old version with the latest one.

questions: Can I import specific slides from a Canva presentation?
How do I choose a certain slide from Canva?
Can I select which slide to import from a presentation?
Does Canva allow importing individual presentation slides?
answer: Only the first slide of a Canva presentation is imported. To use a different slide, move it to the first position in Canva, wait a few minutes for syncing, and try again.

questions: Can my teammates see my Canva files?
Are Canva designs shared across users?
Do other users have access to my Canva content?
Who can view the Canva designs I’ve uploaded?
answer: No. Each user must authorize their own Canva account. Only your personal Canva designs are visible to you inside the app.

questions: How do I disconnect my Canva account?
Where can I remove my Canva connection?
How do I unlink my Canva account from the app?
What’s the process to disconnect from Canva?
answer: Go to the checklist and click 'Disconnect from Canva'. This will remove your connection. You’ll need to reconnect if you want to access your Canva designs again.
